content:
We noticed a strange error in the database. In the datasetlock table, there are 10 datasets with the status "in review". However, on the GUI, only 8 datasets show the same status. Upon inspecting these datasets, we observed that the 2 additional datasets had no drafts in progress and that the revision dates of these drafts were earlier than the supposed review request dates:

* Dataset 1: Last version date: 2023-06-05; review request date: 2024-02-23
* Dataset 2: Last version date: 2024-01-25; review request date: 2024-03-12
The "submitted for review" banner appears on these pages for those with admin rights. We upgraded to version 5.13 in December, and no maintenance dates seem to match any potential problems.
Has anyone seen this bug before? Any ideas on what might have happened?
I would also add that a contributor to the dataset can no longer edit it. Which is logical, given that the dataset is in the datsetlock table.

@GwenaÃ«l Doux hi! Sorry for the slow reply. I was out on vacation.

Would you be able to create an issue about this? https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues

Hello @Philip Durbin ,
No worries, I'd seen that you were on vacation in Ireland (I almost did the whole tour with my family last summer, it was great).
Before open an issue, I wanted to know if anyone had seen this behavior before. After that, I don't have much technical info to give, I have to say I'm not sure where to look for this case!!!!
@GwenaÃ«l Doux the issue looks great. Thanks so much!
